mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte des Ardennes
Nouvelle Carte des Ardennes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taride, A. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 50 x 65 cm., folded in envelope 19 x 14 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Envelope: Nouvelle carte des Ardennes: Avewsnes - Laon - Mezieres - Rethel - Vervins. [original]

Printed price on envelope covered with label reading "Prix: 1 Fr. 25 net." Verso of envelope lists 8 titles, but does not have the listing for "Cartes pour suivre les Op√©rations Militaires." [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: With original printed envelope, as issued. Used by Frederick L. Brown, 2nd Lieut., Signal Corps, Meteorological Division, with his signature and map identification "No D." [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--France--Maps
